ygData.subject: IGL Update - It's On
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright, the IGL will take place this Saturday, July 21st.  I suggest having your characters get there promptly.  If you re in a battle, better get out of it.
ygData.rawEmail:
Return-Path: <KSLawdogg@...>
X-Sender: KSLawdogg@...
X-Apparently-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Received: (EGP: mail-7_2_0); 19 Jul 2001 22:04:47 -0000
Received: (qmail 93801 invoked from network); 19 Jul 2001 22:03:54 -0000
Received: from unknown (10.1.10.26) by l10.egroups.com with QMQP; 19 Jul 2001 22:03:54 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO imo-r05.mx.aol.com) (152.163.225.101) by mta1 with SMTP; 19 Jul 2001 22:03:54 -0000
Received: from KSLawdogg@... by imo-r05.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v31.7.) id r.ba.16ceeea1 (18563) for <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>; Thu, 19 Jul 2001 18:03:40 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <ba.16ceeea1.2888b33c@...>
Date: Thu, 19 Jul 2001 18:03:40 EDT
Subject: IGL Update - It's On
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Alright, the IGL will take place this Saturday, July 21st.  I suggest having 
your characters get there promptly.  If you're in a battle, better get out of 
it.  

In this e-mail I will give the list of who will be fighting who.  Only 
LegendaryNemasis e-mailed me he wanted a fight to the death match, so he'll 
be the only one getting one.  I will also include a detailed description of 
the IGL and what I need from all of you fighters in the IGL Tournaments.

Here's the List:

Regular Division Matches:

Hot Rod (Robo) VS Dragonyfly (Airly)

Epyon (Robo) VS Bruiser (Tankor)

Scatterblaster (Uni) VS Wespah (Airly)

Vehement (Uni) VS Bloodstryke (Airly)

Tankor (Tankor) VS Najah (Airly)

Dragoon (Rudra) VS Pika-Hawk (Tankor)

Bongiovi (Uni/IGL) VS Khonkolor (Airly)

Chordate (Uni) VS Hellpeon (LegendaryN)-Fight to Death

Thug Bot (Hedge) VS Imprisoner (Uni)

Daemos (WingedWarrior) VS Noble (Tankor)

Manthys (Airly) VS Penguin (Tankor)

Nightstrike (Airly) VS Dark Rat (Tankor)

Reptilica (WarBarge) VS Dark Penguin (Tankor)

Ultimo Campeon (Gunther) VS Dark Pika (Airly)

Predator (Uni) VS Blacknightmare (Airly)

Ares (Uni) VS Perndabot (WarBarge)

Lash (Uni/IGL) VS Penguin 2 (Tankor)

Choran (Uni) VS Wolfgang (WarBarge)

Mic Case (Uni/IGL) VS Hugar (Hedge)

Obsidian (Tankor) VS Modem (Uni/IGL)


Character profiles for the IGL members will be given at the end of this 
e-mail.  So you, there are twenty matches, by the way Tankor, let ya have 
Obsidian because I needed on more fight :), so 20 matches.  Each 1 V 1, 
that's 40 characters.  The winner of each match will be the last one 
standing.  If it is obvious that a being can't win but won't stay down, the 
IGL staff will intervene so he/she doesn't die.  Unless it's a fight to the 
death.

Which means over 100 e-mails from the IGL a day at least.  So I'm going to 
thank everyone NOT participating in the IGL in advance for your patience, it 
is much appreciated.  Now, the IGL Tourni will be split into for seperate 
Rounds in the Regular Division.  Round One will be the above list, the one on 
one.  Each fight will take in a seperate arena, so there are twenty seperate 
small arenas where the battles will take place.  The arenas are domed shaped 
and you can't get out of them.  It's pure metal, except for large patches 
that are durasteel glass that are hard to break through.  Anyone attempting 
to break through will be attacked by the IGL staff and thrown in a brig, same 
thing will happen if they attempt to kill someone when not in a 
fight-to-the-death match. 

Round Two will be the remaining 20 combatants who will again fight in one on 
one matches, but since there will only be ten, each arena being a different 
terrain.  IE: Winter conditions, forest, desert, etc.  I'll assign a terrain 
when I see who the victors of Round One are.  So, again, the winner of each 
seperate match will be the last one standing.  The IGL will step in if 
someone is defeated but won't stay down.  Then the remaining 10 combatants 
will go onto Round Three

Round Three will be a free-for-all match.  That means it's everyone against 
everyone.  The winners will be the last three standing.  They will go onto 
Round Four.  But first, Round Three's explanation.  It will be in one massive 
arena, which will be linked to different terrains.  I will give a better 
explanation when it comes up.  

Round Four.  Round Four will be another free-for-all between the three 
victors of Round Three, but its description is an evil surprise :)

So, that takes care of the round descriptions for the Regular Division.  It 
is only me and LegendaryNemasis in the Gestalt Division unfortunately, so I 
can just talk with him via e-mail and save up space here.

I need all fighters in the IGL, you guys, to PARTICIPATE in the IGL.  I want 
each round to be at LEAST a week long.  And when you fight someone, never 
chnage the subject.

In example say Hot Rod was fighting Unitron, a lost cause for Hot Rod :), but 
still...the subject would be: Hot Rod VS Unitron (IGL)
That simple.  Or if it was Blacknightmare and Epyon fighting:
Blacknightmare VS Epyon (IGL)

This way it is VERY, VERY easy for me to keep track of all your posts and if 
people that aren't taking part in the IGL don't want to read it, they know 
what posts to delete/not read.

Thanks a bunch!  It is definately this up and coming Saturday, no more 
postponing.  If you can't participate, I may have to take you out.

Intergalactic Gladiatorial League Member Profiles:

Mic Case (Human) - Case is 32 years old and is 7'5".  He was born on the 
Epsilon Eridani colony and is quite strong.  He trained in a zero gravity 
dojo for several years in his teen years, which built up his strength greatly 
and is where he also learned several martial arts.

He has fought quite a few matches to get to where he is now, and is the most 
favorable Human.  He wears a green helmet and an energy-resistant cloth 
combat suit.  He carries a heavy laser rifle capable of blowing a hole 
through steel.  Attatched to his suit are a couple frag grenades, a knife, 
and a laser pistol.

---

Bongiovi (Haugland) - Bongiovi is a Haugland, an alien lightyears and 
lightyears from Earth and Cybertron.  He stands at 8 feet tall and can be 
described as a mix between a snake and a man.  He has no armor because his 
green scales provide cover that could rival a strong set of armor almost 
entirely over his body.  He can spit acid at his opponents and his claws can 
slice through anything.  He is a sentient being but wears clothing that would 
resemble something from prehistoric man's age.  Strapped to his belt is a 
strong axe that he could cause a lot of damage with.

---

Lash (Epician) -  Lash is an Epician, which is a type of robot nothing like a 
Cybertronian.  It stands at 15 feet tall and has a large power core in its 
huge frame.  The large power core is the source of its main energy for its 
main attack.  Electric bolts.  These bolts can badly damage a robot's frame 
and char their inside circuitry into nothing.

Lash also has a an energy whip, a plasma cannon, and an energy blade.
